scripts.amplify:dev:status: amplify env checkout dev && amplify status
scripts.amplify:prod:status: amplify env checkout prod && amplify status
scripts.amplify:dev:pull: amplify env checkout dev && amplify status && amplify pull && amplify codegen && yarn prettier && amplify status
scripts.amplify:prod:pull: amplify env checkout prod && amplify status && amplify pull && amplify codegen && yarn prettier && amplify status
scripts.amplify:dev:push: amplify env checkout dev && amplify status && amplify push && amplify codegen && yarn prettier && amplify status
scripts.amplify:prod:push: amplify env checkout prod && amplify status && amplify push && amplify codegen && yarn prettier && amplify status
scripts.android:clean: export ENVFILE=.env.development && del-cli --force /android/app/build && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.android:clean:run: export ENVFILE=.env.development && del-cli --force /android/app/build && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant=debug
scripts.android:prod: export ENVFILE=.env.production && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android --variant=release
scripts.build:android:release: export ENVFILE=.env.production && del-cli --force /android/app/build && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.build:android:debug: export ENVFILE=.env.development && del-cli --force /android/app/build && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
